title: Hang On, They’re OWNED by Big Pharma!
description:
This week I interviewed David Sirota - award-winning journalist & writer and founder of Investigative News Site ‘The Lever’. We spoke about the relationship with the Democrats & Big Pharma corporations and how your politicians promise you lower drug prices but don’t deliver. #bigpharma #politicians #pandemic 

Subscribe to David Sirota FREE newsletter over on https://www.levernews.com

title: Surely, This Didn't Just Happen...
description:
The Democrat party. Nothing to see here, it’s all tickety-boo, plain sailing. Oh, other than the 1 million voters who’ve deserted them in favour of the Republicans. But that can’t have anything to do with Joe Biden and Kamala Harris, can it? #democrat #joebiden #kamalaharris 

References
https://www.pbs.org/newshour/politics/more-than-1-million-voters-switch-to-gop-raising-alarm-for-democrats
